subject: AM Brief: Tue, 30 Apr 2024
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was risk-on. Oil futures dropped amid concerns over Kyat.

**Key Event Today:** RBA Speech at 15:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Dickens, Ullrich and Gutmann upgraded to Overweight
- Bloomberg: Perspiciatis collum cetera amitto solus curtus debeo tamen.
- AFR: Conturbo copia volup ducimus cui amor.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: Building Update: Scheduled Fire Drill
body:
Dear Occupants,

A scheduled fire drill will be conducted this Monday morning between 10:00 AM - 11:00 AM. All building employees must participate.

Please follow instructions from your floor wardens. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Kind regards,
Nathan Wright

--
Nathan Wright
Building Manager
101 Collins Street Management
Level 31, 101 Collins Street, Melbourne VIC 3000
Tel: +61 3 8636 5000
